name: Brandon Gee-Moore Top 1% Realtor in 2019-2022 (MLS Sales Greater Vancouver Real Estate Board)

owner.name: Brandon Gee-Moore Top 1% Realtor in 2019-2022 (MLS Sales Greater Vancouver Real Estate Board) (Owner)

address: Brandon Gee-Moore Top 1% Realtor in 2019-2022 (MLS Sales Greater Vancouver Real Estate Board), 5050 Kingsway # 1, Burnaby, BC V5H 4C2

featured_reviews.review_id: Me and my wife bought our first home in Canada, and we are so lucky to have Brandon as our agent. Brandon took consideration deeply to our need and our budget and can always provide us great listings. Our shopping lasted for 3 months and Brandon was always there with us for every visit. He shared us his honest opinions and can always pick up details we didn't notice. He answered us whenever we have questions regardless weekdays or weekends, daytime or nighttime. We eventually got this great deal in Metro Burnaby, which originally thought to be much more expensive. He made the whole completion process so smooth that we didn't had any trouble. He's indeed Top 1% realtor. We greatly appreciate his hard work and professionalism.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Zheng!!!! It was a really enjoyable process working with you guys to find the perfect home!!! I am so happy for you guys and hope you settle in soon! Appreciate the kind words! :)

featured_reviews.review_id: Brandon is the epitome of a consummate professional. Over the course of a year, he demonstrated an exceptional commitment to securing a property on my behalf, and the final outcome left me absolutely elated. Brandon's unwavering patience, profound grasp of the real estate market, and proactive approach were truly extraordinary. He invested the time to thoroughly understand my vision and budget, assuring me that he would lead the charge in finding the perfect property. What truly distinguishes him is his unwavering dedication and impeccable communication throughout the process, which transformed it into a seamless and triumphal experience. Words cannot adequately express my admiration for Brandon's work ethic and his depth of expertise. For anyone in search of a dedicated realtor who prioritizes your needs and makes your real estate aspirations a reality, I wholeheartedly endorse Brandon.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thanks for your kind words Masih!!!!
It was a long journey but I'm happy on how it resulted for you guys!!

featured_reviews.review_id: First Class Service! This guy is an exceptional Realtor! My experience with Brandon is I first had seen his face everywhere. It started with busstops, billboards, note pads... then one day I was driving down Kingsway and bam!!  right beside me is a 4 foot image on a car of Brandon! I went home and told my wife I think I found our realtor. I called Brandon and he came to our current home at the time and gave us a breakdown on market/value. He is very well spoken , confident , handsome young man and has his finger on the heartbeat of the market so we decided to list. We listed aggressively as he suggested and this fetched us multiple offers with our property going 80k over asking!! What a beauty! This was only one experience with Brandon. The second experience is a single family home in Montecito burnaby. I had fully renovated. Brandon showed up and fell in love with the place. I told Brandon "do you think we can get $2.5" we had purchased 1.5 years prior for $1.840 he said yeah l let's try! I believed that if anyone could fetch this number it would be him. Brandon had beautiful photos taken, drone shots, and a walk through video featuring,  yes! The one and only Brandon Gee Moore!! Brandon got us the number we wanted yet again for another huge win. Now we had sold and we did not have a house to move to only a pocket full of cash. This is great but not when you have a pregnant wife and two other kids! He worked day and night until he found us our dream property. No wonder this guy is top 1% . If you can say Brandon you can say SOLD!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Clay!!!!!!! We definitely rocked it on the selling prices of your condo & house!!! The house hunting was definitely a journey! Glad it all worked out the way it did in the end. Couldn't have been better timing! Appreciate all of the kind words!

featured_reviews.review_id: Brandon helped our family with the purchase of our first home. We googled "best Burnaby realtor" and he was the top pick! We were impressed by his professionalism, genuine care for our needs and knowledge of the market. We were able to get a great deal for our home and we wouldn't have been able to do that without Brandon's guidance! His connections made the home buying process so much easier and we would recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell their home. There's a reason he's #1!
featured_reviews.review_text: Brandon helped our family with the purchase of our first home. We googled "best Burnaby realtor" and he was the top pick! We were impressed by his professionalism, genuine care for our needs and knowledge of the market. We were able to get a great deal for our home and we wouldn't have been able to do that without Brandon's guidance! His connections made the home buying process so much easier and we would recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell their home. There's a reason he's #1!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Sanja!! I hope you guys enjoy your new home and settle in soon!!

featured_reviews.review_id: Brandon is a pleasure to work with. He is honest, upfront, determined, and knowledgeable. He helped me through every step of the process of selling the condo. If you need a professional who can get the job done then Brandon is the Realtor to use. He really must be one of the best in Vancouver.
featured_reviews.review_text: Brandon is a pleasure to work with. He is honest, upfront, determined, and knowledgeable. He helped me through every step of the process of selling the condo. If you need a professional who can get the job done then Brandon is the Realtor to use. He really must be one of the best in Vancouver.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Guy!! Really appreciate the kind words!!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Brandon is an amazing agent. He helped us to find a place to purchase taking in consideration our limited budget and specific needs. He was always driven to get the best deal for us, providing advice that helped us to make smart decisions for our future.
Brandon was always welcoming, never made us feel inappropriate for having a limited budget, and was always eager to answer our questions and calm our anxieties. If we ever need to sell or buy in the future, for sure we will contact Brandon again. A great experience.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks MJ!!! You guys were a pleasure to work with! Hope you are all settled in your new home!

featured_reviews.review_id: Brandon is a great realtor - he knows the answers to the important questions we had during the buying process, patiently walked us through all the paperwork and explained it to the novices that we were. Working with the right realtor really worked for us and I realised that at crucial points during the buying process where quick decisions need to be made and good advice, experience and reputation is invaluable. That's why Brandon is the the best. Bonus is he's very affable, friendly, committed, easy to talk to, well-liked and respected in the industry. Go with Brandon!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Jaya!!! I'm super happy for you guys! Hope you settle in soon!

featured_reviews.review_id: Brandon is a professional real estate agent and I highly recommend working with him.  I consider myself incredibly fortunate to have met Brandon.  He helped us with selling and buying our property.  He was very professional, organized always there to guide us every step of the way. He went above and beyond to find us a home. He was amazing selling our home, he works so hard for his clients. He always had our best interest in mind, guiding us, he knows all the right strategies and tactics he is extremely knowledgeable and has a true passion for his work. Brandon was very patient, managed expectations very well, and kept us updated about each step of the process, and addressed and answered all of our questions and concerns. It's been nothing but a positive experience working with him a true pleasure.
